title: Extended by Popular Demand: Historic Werribee Park Mansion Stay with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
The crowning jewel of Werribee Park's resplendent grounds, the historic Lancemore Mansion Hotel Werribee Park offers a tranquil oasis less than an hour's drive from Melbourne's CBD. Ensconced in ten acres of manicured English gardens, it's little surprise this regal retreat has become one of Victoria's most cherished escapes.

Indulge in produce-driven fine dining at award-winning Joseph's Dining or wander through the lush park grounds to sample handcrafted drops at Shadowfax Winery. Return to the hotel to unwind at indulgent L.M. Spa where thoughtfully designed treatments and a Turkish-inspired hammam await.
offer_address: Escarpment Road, Werribee South, Victoria 3030, Australia

title: Romantic Five-Star Stay in one of Australia's Grandest Hotels
description: Whisk your special someone away for a romantic mini-break at the five-star Mansion Hotel & Spa at Werribee Park, a highly sought after destination nestled amid majestic grounds and ranked in the top 10 hotels in Australia by Condé Nast Traveler Readers’ Choice Awards. Unwind in luxury as you get pampered with daily buffet breakfast, a AU$50 dining credit to use at Joseph's Restaurant and Bar, a bottle of Lindenderry wine, two AU$25 spa credits for relaxing massages and indulgent facials at the on-site spa and a guaranteed 12pm checkout to enjoy every minute of your stay.
offer_address: Escarpment Road, Werribee South, Victoria 3030, Australia

title: Award-Winning Heritage Mansion & Spa Less than One Hour from Melbourne
description:
The crowning jewel of Werribee Park's magnificent grounds, the highly sought-after Lancemore Mansion Hotel Werribee Park is a regal retreat located less than an hour from Melbourne's CBD. A sanctuary of peace surrounded by perfectly manicured English gardens, the property captures the very essence of boutique accommodation, with 91 luxuriously appointed guest rooms marrying heritage elegance and modern luxury.

With impressive facilities including fine dining at Joseph's Restaurant & Bar, a blissful spa, picturesque ornamental gardens and extensive grounds, it's little surprise Lancemore Mansion Hotel Werribee Park was ranked in the top 10 hotels in Australia in the 2020 Condé Nast Traveler Readers' Choice Awards. Share excellent wine and conversation over a delicious meal - either with fine dining at the restaurant or lounging with a picnic hamper in the incredible gardens. Bask in the attention of an expert spa therapist at one of Melbourne's most exclusive day spas, or take a wander through the sprawling grounds, home to the Victoria State Rose Garden and the Werribee Open Range Zoo.
offer_address: Escarpment Road, Werribee South, Victoria 3030, Australia

title: Award-Winning Werribee Mansion Stay with Shadowfax Winery Lunch & Open Range Zoo Experience
description:
The crowning jewel of Werribee Park's magnificent grounds, the award-winning Lancemore Mansion Hotel Werribee Park is a cosmopolitan haven of tranquility, less than an hour's drive from Melbourne's CBD. A sanctuary of peace surrounded by 10 acres of perfectly manicured English gardens, this regal retreat captures the very essence of boutique accommodation, with 91 luxuriously appointed guest rooms marrying heritage elegance and modern luxury.

With impressive facilities including fine dining at Joseph's Restaurant & Bar, picturesque ornamental English gardens and easy access to the boutique Shadowfax Winery and magical Werribee Open Range Zoo, it's little surprise Lancemore Mansion Hotel Werribee Park was ranked in the top 10 hotels in Australia in the 2020 Condé Nast Traveler Readers' Choice Awards. When you seek privacy, retire to your boutique accommodation, complete with modern amenities with rich tradition and period features.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Rise and shine with deluxe daily breakfast and parterre garden vistas at Joseph's
- Celebrate with one two-course gourmet dinner for two at Joseph’s
- Indulge with one two-course lunch for two and a glass of wine each at Shadowfax Winery
- Enjoy one Shadowfax Winery wine-tasting experience for two
- Experience an African adventure with two tickets to Werribee Open Range Zoo
- Admire the fine Italianate architecture of Werribee Park Mansion with complimentary access
- Continue the celebrations with a delicious bottle of Lancemore wine, gifted to you upon checkout

**Condé Nast Traveler Readers' Choice Awards 2020: Top 10 Hotels in Australia and the Pacific**

**Superior Upgrade:** For an added touch of luxury, upgrade to a spacious Superior Room with elegant touches, plush king bed and decadent bathtub.
offer_address: Escarpment Road, Werribee South, Victoria 3030, Australia

title: Lancemore Werribee Mansion Stay with Renowned Restaurant, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drink
description:
The crowning jewel of resplendent grounds, the historic Lancemore Mansion Hotel Werribee Park offers a tranquil oasis less than an hour's drive from Melbourne's CBD. Ensconced in 10 acres of manicured English gardens, this regal retreat is the very essence of indulgent accommodation. Step into a world of bygone cosmopolitan elegance in one of Australia’s grandest hotels and spend your days exploring the luxuries of the resort. From elegantly appointed guest rooms marrying modern luxury and traditional Victorian style, to the finery on offer at Joseph's Dining, where passionate hospitality creates unforgettable meals that celebrate local and seasonal flavours - all while overlooking the formal gardens and regal mansion.

Transcendence awaits at the L.M. Spa, designed for the utmost in relaxation with a variety of opulent spa and wellness treatments. With easy access to the Shadowfax Winery and magical Werribee Open Range Zoo, it's little surprise that Lancemore Mansion Hotel Werribee Park has become one of Victoria's most cherished escapes. Enjoy a weekend of high-end romance in a boutique five-star escape and truly succumb to the luxury of this monumental mansion.
offer_address: Escarpment Road, Werribee South, Victoria 3030, Australia

title: Award-Winning Lancemore Werribee Mansion Romance near Shadowfax Winery
description:
The crowning jewel of Werribee Park's magnificent grounds, the award-winning Lancemore Mansion Hotel Werribee Park is a haven of tranquility less than an hour's drive from Melbourne's CBD. This regal retreat boasts impressive facilities, including fine food at Joseph's Dining, picturesque ornamental English gardens, and easy access to the boutique Shadowfax Winery and Werribee Open Range Zoo. When you seek privacy, retire to your boutique room, complete with modern amenities and rich period features.

There's so much to do in Werribee and the surrounding areas - enjoy a stroll through the nearby Victoria State Rose Garden, tackle the stunning Werribee Gorge Circuit Walk, experience ultimate bliss with a treatment at the onsite luxury spa, sample a local tipple at Shadowfax Winery's cellar door or go on safari to see the giraffe, zebra, gorillas, koalas and more at Werribee Open Range Zoo.
offer_address: Escarpment Road, Werribee South, Victoria 3030, Australia

title: Werribee Modern Escape with Upscale Bistro & Bar
description: Uncover Victoria's western suburbs' hub when you stay at the Holiday Inn Werribee, an IHG Hotel. The hotel's stellar location places you within easy access to many local attractions, including Werribee Open Range Zoo, Victorian State Rose Garden  and Werribee Park Mansion. Enjoy dinners at Rosana Bistro and Bar for upscale pub gastronomy (beer-battered fish and chips and sourdough burgers are just the start), and take advantage of the light-filled fitness centre with all modern equipment.
location_description: Holiday Inn Werribee, an IHG Hotel
